author: cms-sw
body:
backport LLVM 21 from CLANG_X IBs to default 16.1.X.
Note that we already have applied clang-tidy changes using LLVM 21 to cmssw master branch. After integrating this version, we will open new PRs to run clang-format using llvm21. We can not open format changes using llvm21 as old llcm 18 will revert those changes. So we have to integrate this first

backport of #10142
title: Update LLVM version 21 for 16.1.X
